DOC.detailed_description: PRIMARY OBJECTIVES : I . To determine maximally tolerate light dose ( MTID ) . Identify systemic normal tissue toxicity use 2- [ hexyloxyethyl ) -2-devinyl pyropheophorbide-a ( HPPH ) photodynamic therapy patient bronchogenic carcinoma-in-situ ( CIS ) microinvasive carcinoma . SECONDARY OBJECTIVES : I . To study tumor response patient bronchogenic carcinoma-in-situ ( CIS ) bronchogenic microinvasive carcinoma . OUTLINE : This dose-escalation study . Patients receive HPPH intravenously ( IV ) 1 hour day 1 . Patients photodynamic therapy laser light day 3 . Patients also undergo therapeutic bronchoscopy endoscopic debridement day 5 . After completion study treatment , patient follow 4-6 week , 6 month , periodically least 2 year .
